QuestData.Title: The Razorbloom
QuestData.Description: Kaalya thinks she picked up a trail. Seems a bunch of dwarves went north to Razorbloom by the signs.$b$bProblem is that place is filled with plant people. I ain't much use against plant people.$b$bAre you willing to investigate?
QuestData.LogDescription: Find clues to the whereabouts of Lera Ashtoes, Nori Sootstache, and Razzlebeard.
QuestData.CompletionText: Curse them botani and their ilk.
QuestData.RewardText: The plant people fattened up my friends with fruit an' honey an' mead. Seems they were fattenin' them up for sure.
